name: @enactprotocol/mcp-server
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server for the Enact Protocol - discover and execute AI tools

scripts.build: bun build ../../src/mcp-server.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && mkdir -p ./dist/web && cp -r ../../src/web/static ./dist/web/ && sed -i.bak '1{/^#!/d;}' ./dist/mcp-server.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/mcp-server.js > temp && mv temp ./dist/mcp-server.js && chmod +x ./dist/mcp-server.js

author: EnactProtocol
